text:
If a line is broken just before a link, the link text is moved to the next 
line, but the link area stays in the same line. This only happens if the 
overflow is very small (more or less 1 character), and there is some text 
right after the link.

I will attach a XSLFO file that reproduces the behaviour in version 0.20.5rc2.
